name: subsurfaceScattering
description: Properties for configuring subsurface scattering effects.

properties.name: enableSubsurfaceScattering
properties.description: Enable subsurface scattering feature, this will disable metallic and parallax mapping property due to incompatibility

properties.name: subsurfaceScatterFactor
properties.description: Strength factor for scaling percentage of subsurface scattering effect applied

properties.name: influenceMap
properties.description: Texture for controlling the strength of subsurface scattering

properties.name: useInfluenceMap
properties.description: Whether to use the influence map.

properties.name: influenceMapUv
properties.description: Influence map UV set

properties.name: scatterColor
properties.description: Color of volume light traveled through

properties.name: scatterDistance
properties.description: How far light traveled inside the volume

properties.name: quality
properties.description: How much percent of sample will be used for each pixel, more samples improve quality and reduce artifacts, especially when the scatter distance is relatively large, but slow down computation time, 1.0 = full set 200 samples per pixel

properties.name: transmissionMode
properties.description: Algorithm used for calculating transmission

properties.name: thickness
properties.description:
In thick transmission mode: Normalized global thickness, the maxima between this value (multiplied by thickness map if enabled) and thickness from shadow map (if applicable) will be used as final thickness of pixel

In thin transmission mode: This value modulates the distance traversed by light inside an object.

properties.name: thicknessMap
properties.description: Texture for controlling per pixel thickness

properties.name: useThicknessMap
properties.description: Whether to use the thickness map

properties.name: thicknessMapUv
properties.description: Thickness map UV set

properties.name: transmissionTint
properties.description: Color of the volume light traveling through

properties.name: transmissionPower
properties.description: How much transmitted light scatter radially

properties.name: transmissionDistortion
properties.description: How much light direction distorted towards surface normal

properties.name: transmissionAttenuation
properties.description: How fast transmitted light fade with thickness

properties.name: shrinkFactor
properties.description: Shrink (absolute) offset towards the normal opposite direction to ensure correct shadow map projection

properties.name: transmissionNdLBias
properties.description: cosine of angle to extend below (N . L = 0) in scattering through thin objects

properties.name: distanceAttenuation
properties.description:
Attenuation of the transmission effect, used to hide artifacts due to low-res shadow maps
For directional lights: attenuation proportional to the distance from the object to the camera.
For other light sources: attenuation proportional to the distance from the object to the light source.

properties.name: transmissionScale
properties.description: Strength of transmission
